name: Scotch Desktop Tape Dispenser, White, with 1 Roll Magic Tape (3/4 in x 1296 in) – Weighted Refillable Holder for Office & Home
short_description: One-Hand Dispensing: Classic weighted tape dispenser with non-skid base stays firmly in place, allowing easy one-handed tearing of tape without the dispenser sliding.
Includes Magic Tape Roll: Comes pre-loaded with one roll of Scotch Magic Tape (3/4 inch x 1296 inches). The matte-finish invisible tape disappears on paper and is writeable for labeling.
Refillable Design: Save money and reduce waste by reusing this dispenser. It’s easy to reload with any standard tape rolls up to 3/4" wide on a 1" core.
Durable Construction: Made from sturdy high-impact plastic in a clean white color. Stands up to daily use at your desk, in the classroom, or around the house.
Convenient for Everyday Use: Keeps your favorite tape at your fingertips for wrapping gifts, sealing envelopes, crafting, or quick repairs. A reliable tool for home, office, or school tasks.
product_description: The Scotch Desktop Tape Dispenser C18 in white is an everyday essential for easy tape handling. Its weighted, non-slip base holds the dispenser steady on your desk, so you can pull and tear tape with just one hand - no need to hold the dispenser down with the other hand. The metal cutting blade is sharp and durable, ensuring a clean cut each time. This dispenser comes ready to use with a roll of Scotch Magic Tape (3/4 inch x 1296 inches). Scotch Magic Tape is the original invisible tape that applies matte and virtually disappears on paper. You can write on it with pen or pencil, which is great for labeling and notes. When your tape runs out, refilling is quick and easy. The dispenser fits any standard tape roll with a 1-inch core (up to 3/4-inch tape width), including Scotch Magic Tape refills and other Scotch tape products. Constructed of high-impact plastic, this dispenser is built to last and will serve your wrapping, sealing, and repairing needs for years. Its simple white design blends into any home or office decor without clutter. Keep this Scotch desktop tape dispenser on your desk or counter so quality tape is always within reach when you need it.
